verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%> O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he is <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> can <S%H4448>utter<s%> the mighty <S%H1369>acts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> who can show <S%H8085>forth<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H8416>praise?<s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are they that <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and he that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times.<s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> with the <S%H7522>favor<s%> that thou bearest unto thy <S%H5971>people:<s%> O <S%H6485>visit<s%> me with thy <S%H3444>salvation;<s%>

That I may <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> of thy <S%H972>chosen,<s%> that I may <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H8057>gladness<s%> of thy <S%H1471>nation,<s%> that I may <S%H1984>glory<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thine <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> we have committed <S%H5753>iniquity,<s%> we have done <S%H7561>wickedly.<s%>

Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H7919>understood<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> thy <S%H6381>wonders<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> they <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H2617>mercies;<s%> but <S%H4784>provoked<s%> him <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> even at the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
Nevertheless he <S%H3467>saved<s%> them for his name's <S%H4616>sake,<s%> <S%H8034><s%> that he might <S%H853>make<s%> his mighty <S%H1369>power<s%> to be <S%H3045>known.<s%>

He <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> also, and it was dried <S%H2717>up:<s%> so he <S%H1980>led<s%> them through the <S%H8415>depths,<s%> as through the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And he <S%H3467>saved<s%> them from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of him that <S%H8130>hated<s%> them, and <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> them from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>
And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> their <S%H6862>enemies:<s%> there was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them <S%H3498>left.<s%>
Then <S%H539>believed<s%> they his <S%H1697>words;<s%> they <S%H7891>sang<s%> his <S%H8416>praise.<s%>
They <S%H4116>soon<s%> <S%H7911>forgot<s%> his <S%H4639>works;<s%> they <S%H2442>waited<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> for his counsel: <S%H6098><s%>
But lusted <S%H183>exceedingly<s%> <S%H8378><s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> in the <S%H3452>desert.<s%>
And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them their <S%H7596>request;<s%> but <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7332>leanness<s%> into their <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
They <S%H7065>envied<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> also in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H6918>saint<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> and swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H5712>company<s%> of <S%H48>Abiram.<s%>
And a <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H1197>kindled<s%> in their <S%H5712>company;<s%> the <S%H3852>flame<s%> burned <S%H3857>up<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
They <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5695>calf<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the molten <S%H4541>image.<s%>
Thus they <S%H4171>changed<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3519>glory<s%> into the <S%H8403>similitude<s%> of an <S%H7794>ox<s%> that <S%H398>eateth<s%> <S%H6212>grass.<s%>
They <S%H7911>forgot<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> their <S%H3467>savior,<s%> which had <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1419>things<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>
Wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and terrible <S%H3372>things<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

Therefore he <S%H559>said<s%> that he would <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them, had <S%H3884>not<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> his <S%H972>chosen<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him in the <S%H6556>breach,<s%> to turn <S%H7725>away<s%> his <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> lest he should <S%H4480>destroy<s%> <S%H7843><s%> them.
Yea, they <S%H3988>despised<s%> the <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> they <S%H539>believed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> his word: <S%H1697><s%>
But <S%H7279>murmured<s%> in their <S%H168>tents,<s%> and <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Therefore he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against them, to <S%H5307>overthrow<s%> them in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%>
To <S%H5307>overthrow<s%> their <S%H2233>seed<s%> also among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and to <S%H2219>scatter<s%> them in the <S%H776>lands.<s%>
They joined <S%H6775>themselves<s%> also unto <S%H1187>Baalpeor,<s%> and <S%H398>ate<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of the <S%H4191>dead.<s%>
Thus they provoked him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H4611>inventions:<s%> and the <S%H4046>plague<s%> broke <S%H6555>in<s%> upon them.
Then stood <S%H5975>up<s%> <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> and executed <S%H6419>judgment:<s%> and so the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed.<s%>
And that was <S%H2803>counted<s%> unto him for <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> unto all <S%H1755>generations<s%> <S%H1755><s%> <S%H5704>forevermore.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>
They <S%H7107>angered<s%> him also <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4808>strife,<s%> so that it went <S%H3415>ill<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%> for their sakes: <S%H5668><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H4784>provoked<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> so that he spoke <S%H981>unadvisedly<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
They did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>nations,<s%> concerning <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> them:
But were <S%H6148>mingled<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H3925>learned<s%> their <S%H4639>works.<s%>
And they <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6091>idols:<s%> which <S%H1961>were<s%> a <S%H4170>snare<s%> unto them.
Yea, they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto <S%H7700>devils,<s%>

And <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> even the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and of their <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto the <S%H6091>idols<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan:<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H2610>polluted<s%> with <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
Thus were they <S%H2930>defiled<s%> with their own <S%H4639>works,<s%> and went a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> with their own <S%H4611>inventions.<s%>

Therefore was the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against his <S%H5971>people,<s%> insomuch that he <S%H8581>abhorred<s%> <S%H853><s%> his own <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen;<s%> and they that <S%H8130>hated<s%> them <S%H4910>ruled<s%> over them.
Their <S%H341>enemies<s%> also <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> them, and they were brought into <S%H3665>subjection<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Many <S%H7227><s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> did he <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them; but <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H4784>provoked<s%> him with their <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and were brought <S%H4355>low<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
Nevertheless he <S%H7200>regarded<s%> their <S%H6862>affliction,<s%> when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> their cry: <S%H7440><s%>
And he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> for them his <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H5162>repented<s%> according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H2617>mercies.<s%>
He <S%H5414>made<s%> them also to be <S%H7356>pitied<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those that carried them <S%H7617>captives.<s%>

Save <S%H3467><s%> us, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> us from <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> and to <S%H7623>triumph<s%> in thy <S%H8416>praise.<s%>

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting:<s%> and let <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%>
